alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 7:45PM CDT until July 12 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Box Butte County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Eastern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northwestern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northwestern Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 644 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moomaws Corner, or 16 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. At 644 PM...golf ball sized hail was reported at Lake Minatare. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Bayard, Minatare, Lake Minatare Campground, Northport, Chimney Rock State Park, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Angora, Court House And Jail Rocks, Moomaws Corner, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Minatare, Redington, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, South Bayard Junction, Melbeta and McGrew. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; Sioux
